attributes.action: Introduce the teaching of British Sign Language in all UK schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I can think of fewer more useful skills to teach someone than a new way of communicating, unhindered by ambient noise.  Think trying to order drinks in a noisy bar, trying to hold a conversation on a train station platform with a freight train rumbling through. Of course it would also make life easier for people who rely on sign language as their primary mode of non-written communication.
